options.optionText: Nice dress. You forget your pants or just trying to distract me?
options.responseText: Oh please, like you need a distraction. One glimpse and your dick is already making all your decisions for you.

followUpOptions.optionText: Your pussy looks like the one begging for it.
followUpOptions.responseText: Begging for it? You think this pussy begs for anything? No, darling, the only thing begging in here is your neglected little friend.
